message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! It's a high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm not quite ready to accept $7500 yet. I'm willing to compromise and offer you the product for $8200. This is the best price I can offer at this time.
I understand that you're not willing to go any lower than $8200, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $7800. Can you consider this price?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to stay closer to my original offer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $8500. This is the best price I can offer at this time.
I understand that you're trying to stay closer to your original offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $7900. Can you consider this price?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to reach an agreement, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to stay above $8000. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $8300. This is my final offer.
I understand that you're making a final offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $8100. This is my final offer as well.

I'm disappointed that we're not closer to an agreement, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to stay above $8000. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $8200. This is my final offer.
I'm sorry, Alice, but I've reached my limit. I'm not willing to go above $8000. I'm going to have to pass on this deal.
